nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: [The bridge of the Retribution is a scene of carnage. The crew are all dead, their bodies showing signs of violence. But the ship is pristine. No hull breaches. No signs of a boarding party.] They... they killed each other. What could have done this?

choices.text: [Computer Science] "Kim, get into the ship's logs. Find out what happened."
Secure the bridge. Check for survivors.
[Void Touched] "The air is thick with psychic residue. Fear. Paranoia. Betrayal."

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: I've restored the logs. The last entry is from the Captain: 'It's in our heads. The artifact from LV-426... it whispers. It turns us against each other. Don't... trust... anyone...' The log cuts out there. The artifact is in the cargo hold.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: The logs are hopelessly corrupted. It's just... screaming. A single, repeating scream, layered over itself a thousand times.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Bridge is secure. No survivors. But... I found this. A personal log. It just says 'Don't listen to the whispers.' over and over again.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You close your eyes and focus on the psychic echoes. You see flashes of the final moments: crew members turning on their friends, their eyes wide with terror and rage. You sense a single, malevolent intelligence at the heart of it all, a being that feeds on these emotions. It is in the cargo hold. And it knows you are here.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: The cargo hold. Whatever did this to them is still on this ship. Are we really going down there, Captain?

choices.text: We're not leaving until we know what this is. Let's go.
No. We're getting out of here. Now.

nodes.speaker: retribution_ai_echo
nodes.text: [You enter the cargo hold. In the center is a single, obsidian artifact, pulsing with a faint, dark light. A voice enters your mind, a soothing, reasonable voice that sounds like your own.] You see? They were flawed. Weak. They would have betrayed you eventually. But you are strong. You can control them. You just need to... listen.

choices.text: [Embrace the whispers] "You're right. They are weak."

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You fight back against the psychic intrusion, your will a shield of iron. The whispers scream and recoil. The artifact cracks, and the malevolent presence within dissipates.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: [Torres raises his sidearm, but he's not pointing it at the artifact. He's pointing it at Kim.] He's been compromised, Captain! He was going to betray us!

nodes.speaker: retribution_ai_echo
nodes.text: [The voice purrs in your mind.] Yes. Good. Now you see the truth. Your crew are just tools. Use them. Break them. They exist to serve your will.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You wisely decide to leave the ghost ship to its ghosts.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have faced the psychic entity and won, cleansing the ship of its evil.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You failed to resist the entity's influence, and now the cycle of violence on the Retribution begins anew.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have embraced the darkness, becoming a vessel for the malevolent entity. Your journey has taken a much darker turn.
